features: 【No Worries After The Sale】JUNDALINDA our mini portable washing machine top priority is your satisfaction. We will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

【Quiet And Efficient Cleaning】: Our Small Clothes Foldable Washing Machine use quiet technology. Portable Bucket Washer forward and reverse impeller imitating hand washing for ten minutes to quickly clean, the top cover can be used as a washboard, saving you time and water; it can be used to clean baby clothes, underwear, socks, towels, toys, or fruits Vegetables or pet supplies.

【Folded Size For Carrying】:The mini half automatic home travel washer is small, easy to store and only 4 inches thick. It doesn't take up much space, making it perfect for tight spaces like dorms, apartments, RVs and self-driving camping. You can enjoy washing your clothes anytime, anywhere. The folding washing machine with drainage basket are perfect for washing small items.

【Durable And Safe Material】: This Small Personal Washer comes with a spin dryer bucket that requires simple assembly. The assembled draining basket is more durable. This item made of food-grade TPR material, very suitable for washing small and thin personal clothes separately to avoid cross and protect the health of family members.

【The Perfect Economical Gift】: Washing things alone saves time, avoids trips to the laundromat, and is more convenient than hand washing. Our lightweight and convenient washer makes it easier to do your laundry outdoors. (Note: The motor of the mini washing machine has a self-protection function, if the washing machine does not work, please consult our technicians promptly.)
body.description: Washing Machine Operation 1.Pour in an appropriate amount of water (the level of the water is better to higher than clothes for about 3~5cm). 2.Turn on the washer timer, Timing time: 0-10 minutes,then the machine begins to work automatically.Its spin cycle is 10 seconds for forward rotation, 1 seconds for stop, 10 seconds for reverse rotation. About 280 revolutions per minute. 3.After the program is over, the timer resets automatically and the machine stops working. 4.Open the bottom drain to drain the water.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ●The lid of this washing machine is a scrubbing board that can be used with it when necessary. ●After Washing, please drain the sewage in the washing machine to avoid changing the water quality for a long time. ●When you need to bring it out Please wipe the whole machine clean, and fold the washing machine according to the method of folding the washing machine, and put the cover on the top. Washing Machine Operation 1.Pour in an appropriate amount of water (the level of the water is better to higher than clothes for about 3~5cm). 2.Turn on the washer timer, Timing time: 0-10 minutes,then the machine begins to work automatically.Its spin cycle is 10 seconds for forward rotation, 1 seconds for stop, 10 seconds for reverse rotation. About 280 revolutions per minute. 3.After the program is over, the timer resets automatically and the machine stops working. 4.Open the bottom drain to drain the water.

High power metal motors The spin cycle of the small portable washing machine is 10 seconds forward, 1 second off, and 10 seconds reverse.About 280 revolutions per minute. Energy-Saving The collapsible washing machine mini foldable washer uses high-frequency vibration to effectively remove dirt without residue and irritants. Energy-saving, saving water and electricity. Washing and leaching Newly upgraded removable drainage basket to avoid deformation in transit. One button drainage, easy to operate, shake off excess water.

High power motor Mini washing machines uses high power motor to make clothes cleaner. Note: Our motors are made of metal, slightly more expensive than plastic motors but more durable. Easy to operate The foldable laundry tub washer machines three modes are carefully designed for quick cleaning in minutes. One-button operation, simple and convenient long press for 2 seconds to start, short press for 1 second to start, 4 minutes to spin dry, 10 minutes to wash, 5 minutes to rinse. Multi-color options Small and convenient, Perfect for small spaces like dorms, apartments, condos, motor homes, RV's, camping and more. Wash your clothes whenever and whenever you want.

Question: Can you wash Adult T-shirt with this? Answer: Yes, you can probably wash one or two, since they are small. Question: Is there a dehydration cycle? Do they get semi-dry? Answer: Yes, it takes away most of the moisture and makes them moist enough to hang to dry Question: Why not use an integrated draining basket? Answer: Because split draining baskets are easy to transport and are not deformed by pressure during transportation. Assembled draining baskets are more durable. Question: Why does the drainage basket fly up? Answer: Because the clothes at the bottom are not put evenly, and the out-of-balance condition will cause the basket to fling out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stick to hand washing.
reviews.reviewText: I had such high hopes for this little machine but they were sadly dashed. First I received an open box and the product didn't have a power cord, so I returned it for a replacement because I really wanted this product. Fast forward to the second product that had all items, but was not great either. The washer came with a washing basket that was not put together and the instructions did not contain any assembly information. I was not even sure what the parts were until I looked online and realized that it was the basket un-assembled. I put everything together but the instructions were not great on using the product either. Finally went to give it a test run and the drain plug did not fit tightly and looked like it might pop out at any moment. Not really what you want happening during the wash cycle. When I was using it the product moved around a lot and water splashed out from the top even with the top on, and I didn't even have the bucket half full. So after all that I have decided hand washing is much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR WASHING POTTY TRAINING UNDERWEAR
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this little washer to wash my son's potty-training underwear in because I didn't want to put them in our regular washer. The assembly was a little difficult because the directions were not that great. But my husband figured it out pretty quick. This little washer actually works good and gets my sons underwear clean. It's a really good price and I like that it folds flat to store.
